content.rendered:
Directed by Dinesh Vijan.

Written by Siddharth-Garima. Siddharth Singh. Garima Wahal.

Cast Deepika Padukone(Dancer). Kriti Sanon(Saira / Saiba). Rajkummar Rao(Muwaqqit). Sushant Singh Rajput(Shiv / Jillan). Jim Sarbh(Zakir Merchant / Kabir). Varun Sharma(Radha). Suneel Sinha(Saira’s father in previous life). Vikas Verma(Maanav). Karan Singh Chhabra(Happy). Rina Fatania(Maya). Deependra Singh(Vijay).Nidhi Subbaiah. Manpreet Toor(Dancer). Miroslav Lhotka(Zak’s bodyquard). Tess Georgia Dimos(Melissa). Rachita Singh(Astrologer). Jashan Singh Kohli(Golu (as Jashan Prit Singh)). Satendra Bagasi(Dhruv). Geeta Agarwal Sharma(Gurmeet Kaur). Jaykar Arudra(News Reporter). Aaital Khosla(Friend). Vinod Chaddha(Gurmeet Singh). Navneet Singh(Lucky). Mateo Kliba(Tourist (uncredited)). BalÃ¡zs Veres(Bar Guest (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Homi Adajania. Murshid Akhtar. Hanif Chunawala. Priya Gupta. Madhav Roy Kapur. Zita Kisgergely. Kushagra Kulshrestha. Bhushan Kumar. Ivan Petrusic. Prem Pillai. Ashok Shetty. Poonam Shivdasani. Avi Udeshi. Dinesh Vijan.

Production T-Series. Maddock Films.
